body: Thanks for raising this! As of right now we are still using it. I'll see if we can drop "our" end of the hack, changing it to `bool $flag` would not be a problem for us.

body: @sebastianbergmann feel free to remove the entire hack. It is not needed any longer. See https://github.com/phingofficial/phing/pull/1061
